mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_qna(sqnaIdx, userIdx, subject, content,answer,groupNum) VALUES (#{sqnaIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{subject},#{content},#{answer},#{sqnaIdx})
INSERT INTO service_qna(sqnaIdx, userIdx, subject, content,answer,groupNum) VALUES (service_qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userIdx}, #{subject},#{content},#{answer},#{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM service_qna s JOIN checkId c ON s.userIdx=c.userIdx
mapper.update: UPDATE service_qna SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE sqnaIdx =#{sqnaIdx}
UPDATE service_qna SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE sqnaIdx =#{sqnaIdx}
